title: The Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde

sources.title: Jekyll & Hyde | Full Movie | Horror Mystery | Classic Tale | Halloween 2022
sources.description:
Jekyll & Hyde - Gabriel is shocked to learn that his good friend Henry Jekyll has committed a murder. A confession written by Jekyll tells an incredible story - that his experiments had caused him to transform into a murderous villain named Mr Hyde. 
2021.  Stars: Michael McKell, Tom Hendryk, Helen Crevel

metadata.Plot: Concerned by his good friend Dr Henry Jekyll's recent behaviour, Gabriel Utterson is driven to uncover the identity of the mysterious and dangerous Mr. Hyde, to whom Jekyll is enthralled.
metadata.Writer: Vlad Butucea, Hope Dickson Leach, Robert Louis Stevenson
metadata.Actors: David Hayman, Lorn Macdonald, Henry Pettigrew
